name: FootyFeeds
body:
### Welcome to the FootyFeeds blog
Welcome to the FootyFeeds blog where you can read about the latest updates to the football news aggregator.

### About FootyFeeds
FootyFeeds gathers the latest football headlines using RSS feeds from around the web. All the latest news stories are stored in the FootyFeeds [PostgreSQL](http://www.postgresql.org/) database allowing FootyFeeds to act as fan's one source for latest headlines regarding their team. The website backend is powered by [Node](https://nodejs.org/en/)/[Express](http://expressjs.com/) and [AngularJS](https://angularjs.org/) is used for the frontend desktop version. The FootyFeeds smartphone app is a work in progress, using [PhoneGap](http://phonegap.com/) and [jQuery Mobile](https://jquerymobile.com/).

FootyFeeds was created by [@alexocallaghan](http://twitter.com/alexocallaghan).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
